verses.text: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* God alone \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul finds rest; \w my|strong="H1732"\w* salvation comes \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*. \w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* fortress; \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* never \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shaken.

\w How|strong="H3444"\w* \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* threaten \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man? \w Will|strong="H3808"\w* all \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* throw \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w down|strong="H4131"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaning wall \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tottering fence?

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w fully|strong="H5921"\w* intend \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w cast|strong="H5186"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* lofty perch; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* lies; \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouths \w they|strong="H5921"\w* bless, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* inwardly \w they|strong="H5921"\w* curse. Selah
Rest \w in|strong="H7130"\w* God alone, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7130"\w* soul, \w for|strong="H7130"\w* \w my|strong="H7130"\w* hope comes from \w Him|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* rock \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* salvation; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* fortress; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* shaken.

\w My|strong="H3808"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* honor rest \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*, \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H6697"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H6697"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H4268"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* times, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* people; pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hearts \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H3519"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*. Selah

Lowborn \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vapor, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* exalted \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lie. Weighed \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scale, \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H8210"\w*; \w together|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vapor.

Place \w no|strong="H5927"\w* trust \w in|strong="H1121"\w* extortion, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w false|strong="H3577"\w* hope \w in|strong="H1121"\w* stolen goods. \w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* riches increase, do \w not|strong="H5927"\w* \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* heart \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* spoken once; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* twice: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H2428"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3820"\w* God,

\w and|strong="H8085"\w* loving devotion \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5797"\w* repay \w each|strong="H8147"\w* man according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* deeds.\f + \fr 62:12 \ft Cited in Romans 2:6\f*
